## Functions

### getOrCreateVPValueForSCEVExpr() {#a064976a6c7458b10c24021b7334cec2a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>VPValue &#42; llvm::vputils::getOrCreateVPValueForSCEVExpr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> &amp; Plan, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42; Expr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE)</>}>
Get or create a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a> that corresponds to the expansion of <code>Expr</code>.

If <code>Expr</code> is a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevconstant">SCEVConstant</a> or <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevunknown">SCEVUnknown</a>, return a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a> wrapping the live-in value. Otherwise return a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpexpandscevrecipe">VPExpandSCEVRecipe</a> to expand <code>Expr</code>. If <code>Plan&#39;s</code> pre-header already contains a recipe expanding <code>Expr</code>, return it. If not, create a new one.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h/#l00033">33</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h">VPlanUtils.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-cpp/#l00026">26</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-cpp">VPlanUtils.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getSCEVExprForVPValue() {#a5999b0390c92ee4af2544fe9772454bf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const SCEV &#42; llvm::vputils::getSCEVExprForVPValue (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a> &#42; V, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE)</>}>
Return the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expression for <code>V</code>.

Returns <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/scevcouldnotcompute">SCEVCouldNotCompute</a> if no <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expression could be constructed.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h">VPlanUtils.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-cpp/#l00072">72</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-cpp">VPlanUtils.cpp</a>.

### isUniformAcrossVFsAndUFs() {#a0c663bf15e8398176f591270e7676f96}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::vputils::isUniformAcrossVFsAndUFs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a> &#42; V)</>}>
Checks if <code>V</code> is uniform across all VF lanes and UF parts.

It is considered as such if it is either loop invariant (defined outside the vector region) or its operand is known to be uniform across all VFs and UFs (e.g. VPDerivedIV or VPCanonicalIVPHI).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h/#l00070">70</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h">VPlanUtils.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-cpp/#l00083">83</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-cpp">VPlanUtils.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
